name: Project3 (carl.244)
description: The user has the option to pick and choose a single object from three different options shown which are a tiger, Lego and minion prefab. By using animation controller, if you selected "tiger", it will rotate and increase its scale. Second, if you selected "Lego", it will rotate continuously and move along. Last, if you selected "minion", it will move its position up and down and will move around 360 degrees.
